description:
A rising sense of precaution starts to surround Hoden-chan, meanwhile Plug and Aresta decide not to be seen by Sento. Aresta tries to restore Sento back to normal, but regardless of how many times she tries, she always seems to fail. Plug on the other hand, has replaced a new employee on tracking down a Z-target, but as usual things start to make a turn for the worse...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ふぁいと! いっぱつ!
